items.typeLine: Cautious Divine Mana Flask of Heat
explicitMods: 100% increased Recovery when on Low Life
Immunity to Freeze and Chill during flask effect
Removes Freeze and Chill on use

items.name: Maligaro's Virtuosity
flavourText: with great speed and terrible consequences.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Throws a spectral copy of your melee weapon. It flies out and then returns to you, in a spinning attack that strikes enemies in its path.
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Fires an arc of knives in front of the caster which deals physical damage.
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that increases the movement speed, attack speed and cast speed of you and your allies.
explicitMods: You and nearby allies gain 8% increased Movement Speed

You and nearby allies gain 13% increased Cast Speed

socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Active Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Curses all targets in an area, making them less resistant to elemental damage.

socketedItems.secDescrText: An icy projectile which has a chance to freeze enemies it passes through. The projectile fades quickly, reducing damage and freezing chance until it runs out of time and dissipates completely.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Performs a warcry, adding endurance charges proportional to the number of surrounding enemies. Taunts all nearby enemies to attack the caster.
explicitMods: 21 Endurance Charges granted per one hundred nearby enemies

socketedItems.secDescrText: Discharges Endurance Charges, making the character invulnerable to physical damage for a short time, proportional to how many endurance charges were expended.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Summons fiery elemental shields providing additional armour for a short duration. If cumulative physical damage prevented by your blocking or armour reaches a threshold, the shields explode outwards, dealing fire damage to surrounding enemies.
explicitMods: Shields break after 478 total Damage is prevented
